meta_description: Portfolio to showcase my skills and projects.
bio_description_1: I'm Ademir, a software engineer with a degree in Computer Science, focused on transforming ideas into robust, scalable, and accessible digital solutions. My experience covers the full development cycle, from architectural definition and data modeling to implementation, automated testing, and deployment automation (CI/CD). With proficiency in technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS, I integrate technical depth with a systemic vision to deliver high-performance, quality, and maintainable solutions.
bio_description_2: My motivation is to continuously learn and solve problems efficiently. On the {nexus} project, a link aggregation platform, I developed a complete full-stack application, from architectural definition and data modeling to implementation, automated testing, and deployment automation (CI/CD). I created a RESTful API with Node.js and Express, implemented a secure authentication system with JWTs, and automated the development and deployment process with Docker and GitHub Actions.
bio_description_3: I'm not content with just using tools and libraries; I seek to understand how they work 'under the hood.' In the frontend area, this curiosity led me to create {simplemotionreact}, a zero-dependency animation library for React. In it, I developed a robust state machine using hooks to orchestrate the transition phases of components throughout their lifecycle. I am always looking to improve myself to create high-quality solutions.
